long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
sub2srt is a subtitle converter for .sub files. It converts the .sub files to .srt files. This is very helpful for example users using VideoStream with Chromecast. You can drag&drop files or use the button provided in the UI. Its very easy to use and does just what it says.

Version history:

0.10.1
  - added | multiline support
  - fixed issue with second converting

0.10.1
  - initial version
